column1: It's time to end the tantrum and start the transition.

Every parent has a story about a kid throwing a temper tantrum in the toy store when you said no. Trump is actually trying make it harder for government to function - in the middle of a deadly pandemic - because the American people overwhelmingly told him no at the ballot box.
He's learning you can't file for bankruptcy when you fail at the presidency.  https://t.co/SmJGIN9k80
Congrats to @LaurenUnderwood for a well deserved victory! https://t.co/ss7cRJVF4Q
This isn't a political victory it's a victory for American democracy and the rule of law.

I congratulate President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on their historic victory and I look forward to working with them on the challenges our country faces. We need to bridge the divisions and return to leadership that seeks to unite the American people.
After four long years of divisive and dishonest leadership the American people have rendered ultimate judgment with their legally cast votes.

It's an honor to win the trust of the people of the 11th Congressional District for another term in Congress. I am committed to working hard each and every day to represent all the people who call our communities home. #THANKYOU

Because of an unprecedented number of mail-in ballots this year and differences in how states report vote totals it will likely take longer to find out final results in many places. Be patient! It's vital that every vote is counted and reported accurately. #ElectionDay2020

Mike Pence forgot to mention the reason we add on pace to develop a vaccine in record time: scientific research investments made by the Obama-Biden administration.
